name: Crisp Chat
description: Integrate with Crisp Chat to list, send, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Conversations
tools.description: List conversations from Crisp. Returns session IDs, visitor info, states, and last messages.

tools.name: Send Message
tools.description: Send a message in a Crisp conversation. Can send text or a note (internal message).

tools.name: Get Conversation
tools.description: Get details of a specific Crisp conversation by session ID. Returns visitor info, state, and message history.

tools.name: List People
tools.description: List people (contacts) from Crisp. Optionally search by name or email.

tools.name: Update Conversation
tools.description: Update a Crisp conversation state or metadata. Can change state to resolved, pending, or unresolved.

websiteId.label: Website ID
websiteId.description: Your Crisp website ID (found in your Crisp dashboard settings)
